property.name: countSQL
property.value: select count(*) from cube_instance cui, composite_instance coi where cui.cmpst_id=coi.id

property.name: SQL
property.value: select * from (select rownum rn,cui.CIKEY,TO_CHAR(cui.CREATION_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SSxFF') as CREATION_DATE, TO_CHAR(cui.MODIFY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SSxFF') as MODIFY_DATE,cui.STATE,cui.PRIORITY,cui.TITLE, cui.STATUS,cui.ROOT_ID,cui.PARENT_ID,cui.ECID,cui.CMPST_ID,cui.PARENT_REF_ID,cui.COMPONENTTYPE,cui.COMPOSITE_NAME, cui.DOMAIN_NAME,cui.COMPONENT_NAME,cui.COMPOSITE_REVISION, TO_CHAR(cui.CPST_INST_CREATED_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SSxFF') as CPST_INST_CREATED_TIME,coi.TITLE as COMPTITLE from cube_instance cui, composite_instance coi where cui.cmpst_id=coi.id order by CREATION_DATE asc)

property.name: columnsSQL
property.value: select rownum rn,cui.CIKEY,TO_CHAR(cui.CREATION_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SSxFF') as CREATION_DATE, TO_CHAR(cui.MODIFY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SSxFF') as MODIFY_DATE,cui.STATE,cui.PRIORITY,cui.TITLE, cui.STATUS,cui.ROOT_ID,cui.PARENT_ID,cui.ECID,cui.CMPST_ID,cui.PARENT_REF_ID,cui.COMPONENTTYPE,cui.COMPOSITE_NAME, cui.DOMAIN_NAME,cui.COMPONENT_NAME,cui.COMPOSITE_REVISION, TO_CHAR(cui.CPST_INST_CREATED_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SSxFF') as CPST_INST_CREATED_TIME,coi.TITLE as COMPTITLE from cube_instance cui, composite_instance coi where cui.cmpst_id=coi.id and rownum=1
